section.title: Retail Site
section.para: To create a new Retail Site select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Retail Site, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select the Site where the Retail Site is to be located. The Sites found in this drop down list are defined under the Inventory menu.

note.para: For those running xTuple ERP PostBooks Edition, you only have access to one Site. However, within that Site you may define an unlimited number of Retail Sites.

listitem.para: Specify the number of days Quotes at the Retail Site are still valid.
Specify the following Accounts to be used when transactions are posted at the Retail Site:
Identify a General Ledger (G/L) Account to distribute assets to. The selected Account will be the default Asset Account for the Retail Site.
Identify a General Ledger (G/L) Account to distribute adjustments to. The selected Account will be the default adjustment Account for the Retail Site.
Identify a General Ledger (G/L) Account to distribute Check clearings to. The selected Account will be the default Check clearing Account for the Retail Site.
Display lists Bank Accounts which have been added to the Retail Site.

Select a Bank Account from the list of available Bank Accounts to be used for processing Retail transactions from this Retail Site. After you select one, use the ADD button to include the Bank Account in the list of Bank Accounts available to the Retail Site.
Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the Retail Site and adds it to the master list of Retail Sites.
Adds the selected Bank Account to the list of available Bank Accounts.
Removes the selected Bank Account from the list of available Bank Accounts.

section.para: To create a Cash Register terminal for the Retail Site, select the "Terminals" tab. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Cash Register terminal, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Display lists the Cash Register terminals associated with the Retail Site.
Select to add a Cash Register terminal to the list.
Select to remove a Cash Register terminal from the list.
